author: Jim Meehan
description: As Jim Meehan said when he gave us this recipe, "This hybrid of Audrey Saunders Gin Gin Mule substitutes cognac for gin and adds falernum and cucumber. Milk & Honey barman Sam Ross has a similar drink made with Bourbon dubbed the Kentucky Maid: consider this her spicy French sister."
name: French Maid
recipeIngredient: 10 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: MUDDLE cucumber in base of shaker
Add next 5 ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass
